ingredients.ingredient: 2 teaspoons Hidden Valley® Original Ranch® Salad Dressing & Seasoning Mix

cookingTips: Toss potatoes evenly with oil and seasoning for consistent flavor
Arrange in single layer for better browning and crispiness
Stir halfway through cooking to ensure even roasting
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Do you prefer softer or crispier roasted potatoes, and how does that affect cooking time?
